about_the_game:
Woke Quest is a satirical turn-based role-playing game that humorously critiques real-life events, personalities, and RPG conventions.

Four unsuspecting individuals from diverse backgrounds are drawn together by a mysterious force that transcends the boundaries of their reality. Suddenly, a surge of energy engulfs them, transporting them from their computer screens into a realm unlike anything they’ve ever imagined.

Emerging from a cosmic rift, they find themselves in a vibrant world brimming with magic, mythical creatures, and breathtaking landscapes straight out of an RPG. It quickly becomes clear that they are far from home.

Unbeknownst to them, their arrival marks the beginning of an epic saga that will shape the destiny of this enchanted realm and challenge their very understanding of reality.

content_descriptors.notes:
Dark humor
Use of drugs and alcohol
Depictions of sex and acts
Depictions of stereotypes.

name: Woke Quest

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10, Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4340 or better
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Compatible OpenGL / VRAM 1GB or better
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better

dejus.descriptors:
Violência Extrema
Drogas ilícitas
Linguagem imprópria

short_description: Woke Quest is a satirical turn-based RPG that humorously critiques real-life events, people, and gaming clichés. Four unsuspecting individuals are suddenly pulled from their reality into a vibrant realm of magic and mythical creatures. Sole the mystery of a deep conspiracy.
